import { useRef, useState } from "react" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import { createBug } from "../../redux/actions/userActions" const CreateBug = () => { const titleRef = useRef() const statusRef = useRef() const typeRef = useRef() const imageRef = useRef(null) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [image, setImage] = useState("") const dispatch = useDispatch() const url = process.env.REACT_APP_CREATE_BUG const onSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() let formData = new FormData() formData.append("title", titleRef.current.value) formData.append("status", statusRef.current.value) formData.append("type", typeRef.current.value) formData.append("file", imageRef.current.value) dispatch(createBug(url, formData, setLoading)) } return ( <>

BUG

{/* depends on type */} {/* only .gif and .png */}
) } export default CreateBug
